location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Circular no.3245 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The circular is a request to the Resident that he assist Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Henry Montgomery Lawrence with the requisition of any further materials which he may require in the preparation of his forthcoming publication.
